name: Hacking Simulator (Overflux Studios)
description:
Hacking Simulator

It's you and your computer, office worker by day, pro hacker by night. What will you hack today? With different difficulty levels and a lot of passwords to guess this is a simple game to have some fun and test your brain.

This is a very simple puzzle game based around solving anagrams of words. There are only 5 words per level at the minute and more will be added in the future.

THE GAME IS PACKAGED INTO A .EXE FILE WITH NSIS FOR EASE OF INSTALL

This game was made for the December Game Jam hosted by OrangeScientist1 with the theme of 'Digital Is Better'.

It was made in Unity and programmed in C#

Assets:
- Low Poly Office Props - LITE

- Consola font
